ygData.subject: Re: Tinkering and raising skill level
ygData.msgSnippet: ... thing ... Before the item-return patch the skill acutally went up decently on lanterns and I got some points from cams as well.  The item-return patch
ygData.messageBody:
At 07:26 PM 7/7/99 -0000, you wrote:
>From: catbik@...
>
>Ok.
>
>I've spent way over 100 plat making flameless lanterns which is the ONLY
thing
>that I can make easily that Is not trivial.. However..
>
>My tinkering skill level has not gone up 1 point! Is anyone else having this
>problem?
>

Before the item-return patch the skill acutally went up decently on
lanterns and I got some points from cams as well. The item-return patch
KILLED the improvement rate drastically, also you still don't get items
back on failure. BTW if you see your skill as 'Average' in the skills list
that means you gained a point or more somewhere in your tinkering.


>Also I hate how half the items are bugged!
>Where can I get that Gnomish tattered cloak to make the Heated cloak?
>Collapsable fishing poles are a pipe dream, along with spyglasses,
Infravision
>goggles and gnomish fireworks...
>

Gnomish cloak = small tattered cape. No patterns exist for cloaks
(translation: tailors can't make them) but the 'rare' patchwork pieces are
sometimes given as rewards for low level warrior quests. I have yet to
come across a SMALL size tattered cape, though.

-Luke
